summary: Thirty Seconds to Mars, often styled as 30 Seconds to Mars, is an American rock band from Los Angeles, formed in 1998. The main members are brothers Jared and Shannon Leto. Their first album in 2002 had good reviews but didn't sell much. They became famous worldwide with their second album, "A Beautiful Lie," in 2005. Their music style evolved with each album, incorporating experimental sounds. The band has faced legal issues and changed record labels. They've sold over 15 million albums and are known for their energetic live shows, blending different music genres with thought-provoking lyrics.
title: Thirty Seconds to Mars
